mapper.insert: insert into user_tb(username, password, salt, name, email, contact, created_at) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{name}, #{email}, #{contact}, now())
mapper.update: update user_tb set password=#{password}, salt = #{salt}, email = #{email}, contact = #{contact} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from user_tb where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
select salt from user_tb where username = #{username}
